comments:
Whenever a hyperlink is created in one report to generate a second report, whether in the same window or a new one, and regardless of whether any parameters are passed, only the first hyperlink in the detail section of the main report will allow the second report to be generated. The link for the second record and all subsequent records produce an error saying that the dataset for the second report is empty.
